text: Former cast mates have been quick to speak out about the Bachelor franchise. Former US Bachelor contestants ars weighing in on the Bachelor in Paradise controversy. Leah Block, who appeared on both season 20 of Bachelor and last year's Bachelor in Paradise, has used her experience with the franchise to slam the show for the alleged sexual misconduct between contestants Corinne Olympios and DeMario Jackson. In several tweets posted on her Twitter this morning, Leah, 26, said the producers of Bachelor in Paradise - a spinoff series that brings former Bachelor and Bachelorette contestants to try their luck at love again in a tropical locale - were at fault. ` ` All of these contestants ( including myself ) are supposed to trust these producers who we all think are our'friends '. Yeah... definitely not,''
